channel.title: My Project Thread
channel.description:
[ul][img]http://vividgamers.com/images/banner-1.png[/img]
Well I have a project called Vividgamers, I am working on it in my spare time. I currently work on it about 1 - 2 hours everyday just to keep it running. I have had many comments on the old version. I am proud to announce that I am re-opening a server once I complete everything which is required for a server.
This server is going to be different unlike others this server will have a custom mini-game which is 100 percent done by Vividgamers, unlike those servers where you see that Barrows, Slayer, or GodSword mini-games have been leeched from newby sources (unique) such as allstar scape.
So below in this thread I will be showing previews of my hard work. I will show you many screenshots of how the server is looking and the computer specifications.
[b] About the Server:[/b]
[i]The Host:[/i]
Yes I know the server isn't online yet but I am getting ready for hosting Beta. The hosting computer is quite advanced in certain ways.
[u]Specifications:[/u] [list] [li]Ram: 2GB[/li] [li]Computer Processing Unit: 2GHZ (2000 Lines per second)[/li] [li]Operating System: Windows Server 2003 [WS2003])[/li] [li]Harddisk: 120GB (Including Windows Files[10GB])[/li][/list]
[u]Other information:[/u] This PC is not a VPS it is currently hosted on road-runner internet the fastest around in the USA. Its average download speed is 4000KB's per second and the upload is roughly 1000KB's per second.
The computer has also been re-formatted so that our hosting computer is virus free.
[i]The Server:[/i]
[b]The Team[/b] At the moment I am currently the only coder. But we have a hoster, his name is Evan so I suppose hes a member of the team.
[list] [li]Luke[/li] [li]Evan[/li] [/list]
[b]Our Goals[/b]
[list] [li]Block the All Go Free Bot [b]√[/b][/li] [li]Clean the source [b]√[/b][/li] [li]Complete combat [b]√[/b][/li] [li]Make ALL skills work [b]X[/b][/li] [/list]
[i]Current Skills (If there not listed, I havn't completed them yet)[/i]
[b]Agility[/b] (10 December 2009) [img]http://img192.imageshack.us/img192/9715/agility.png[/img] [url=http://img192.imageshack.us/img192/9715/agility.png]View full size image[/url]
[b]Herblore[/b] (12 December 209) [img]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/8303/herblore.png[/img] [url=http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/8303/herblore.png]View full size image[/url] Well thats basically all what ive done, but keep in mind I have coded everything which is on our server : -)[/ul]

item.title: My Project Thread
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Codez Epic Codez
item.description:
@Epic_Codez wrote:

I have removed The Thread per-client as I noticed a couple of performance changes. I have am now working on Agility, I will post a couple of screenshots.

Read full topic

item.title: My Project Thread
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

You should add the crash patch that Blake was talking about and released on many servers on Rs and use an Array list for your connections so you can keep the nooby SYI’s at bay. You many still have a few null though.

Read full topic

item.title: My Project Thread
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:3, topic:317285”][quote author=I Yaa I link=topic=413829.msg3047737#msg3047737 date=1259883414]
Thread-per client makes it lag like hell
[/quote]

Yes, I really agree![/quote]

Thanks at least someone has a brain

Read full topic

item.title: My Project Thread
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

So far it seems to sound good, I think i’ll check up on this regularly to see how the developments doing ;).

Read full topic

item.title: My Project Thread
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

I Yaa I:

Thread-per client makes it lag like hell

It does help, but also hurts the performance of the server.

Read full topic

[ul]

Well I have a project called Vividgamers, I am working on it in my spare time. I currently work on it about 1 - 2 hours everyday just to keep it running. I have had many comments on the old version. I am proud to announce that I am re-opening a server once I complete everything which is required for a server.
